title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for integrating Ollama models into Python apps with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, works in Node and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter enabling Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Conversational CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-like inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local documents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, structured output, fine-tune, Docker GPU, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON handling.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama responses into channels or DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization & Q&A.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot leveraging Ollama for private/local LLM assistance inside workspaces.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6 and C++.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama completions to MCP clients like Claude Desktop.
